name: website
description: Basic bundle structure for a default website project.
author: Mario Fehr

scripts.lint: yarn run lint:css && yarn run lint:js
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:css:fix && yarn run lint:js:fix

scripts-info.build: Compiles the js and css and checks the code style.
scripts-info.watch: Watch the js and css changes.
scripts-info.lint: Check the js and css code style.
scripts-info.lint:fix: Check the js and css code style and tries to fix it
scripts-info.lint:js:fix: Checks the js code style and tries to fix it.
scripts-info.lint:css:fix: Checks the css code style and tries to fix it.
